title: Action Design Research-Based Educational Program for Blended Learning Service Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital literacy and work experience in social sector roles
context.additional_context: Focus on smartphone-based learning activities with project-based assessments to strengthen practical application skills

learning_goals: Learners can explain the seven core design principles of blended learning services and apply them to real-world cases.
Learners can design effective learning processes using smartphones in limited technological environments.
Learners can evaluate and improve blended learning services using action design research methodologies.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
